Posts.Content: On 10/20/2007 honeybee98011 wrote: Hi I am wondering what side effects anyone else has experienced from Zometa. So far it has affected my eyesight to the point I cannot drive. It has done marveks for my bone mets but the trade off for the eyes really sucks. I am 40 and in Seattle. Please let me know.   Mindi   Hi, I have been on Zometa since 2004 I am stage 4  withmets to my bone  lower spine, It does cause  me some times to have blurred vision, but I have no other problems you didn't say how long that you have been on it or how often that you are taking it>  I  am  only taking it every 3 months now it is the femera that kicks me!! its a daily dose  hang in there girl I'm 50 or will be and  U just keep fighting    WE ARE SURVIORS!!
Posts.Title: Zometa
